title: hyipdog
author: hyipdog
content: Hello Gambling Enthusiasts!We are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.We will be funding your accounts with real money in crypto.All GEOS welcomedIf interested, contact me on telegram https://t.me/cryptox42

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why should we contact you on Telegram.If you do not know what to do on this forum, you can get a campaign manager like Hhampuz, Royse777 or icopress to help you. It is called review campaign. With it, more people will know more about your gambling site. Campaign manager can also propose to you to begin a signature campaign.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMHello Gambling Enthusiasts!We are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.We will be funding your accounts with real money in crypto.All GEOS welcomedIf interested, contact me on telegram https://t.me/cryptox42@op I don’t think it is wise to ask people to contact you privately on your telegram and since your account doesn’t have any reputation, I would advice that you maintain all conversations on this your thread and what we are actually expected to test ? And how much real money are you expecting to pay for each review and how do you intend to make this payments l? These and many more other questions are what any intending user would want to know.I’m willing to test your platform if we can maintain communication on the thread and I also understand that you’re a newbie and might be limited to the numbers of messages you might want to send that’s why I wanted it been on the thread atleast for now and I think an escrow wouldn’t be a bad idea.Good luck.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMWe are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.I'm willing to go and work with you to test the platforms but I would love to work via this forum instead of going on Telegram. Your account is quite new and I believe it would be foolish step to trust someone new like you. It would be better if you have someone as Escrow as that would be helpful. But, I'm highly interested in doing that job if you get someone reputed as escrow for the thing.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: @OP. The concern of everyone is valid why we need to contact you through Telegram. Well, for me, there is no problem at all to contact you through that but much better to disclose all the links or whatsoever that's needed to go onto the work that you're offering.And the suggestion of oshosondy is also a better way to get those reviews that you need of what you're working with. Also, kindly indicate if this is going to be a paid gig or not because if it's not, you'll probably get few to no interested people in giving feed back to that casino that you're working with.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: You are at the right section, might as well explore some advertising strategy that some businesses are doing.What you are looking is a review campaign, you can always hire someone to run it, or just create your own and get some active gamblers here to make a review on your website, of course it comes with a fee just like other review campaign here. Anyway, good luck, I hope you can find more inputs with what we suggests here.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Your forum name is also associated with scam so expect people to doubt what you are trying to ask here. So to erase those assumptions or doubts much better deal with people here and not on telegram since for sure many gamblers would participate on your task.Just post the updates and or anything related to what other things needed here since that's what people in this forum want to see since they always feel safe here so try to make all the concern valid since it will also help you if your intention is legitimate since to many reputable member which have experience on gambling would provably join you.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMIf interested, contact me on telegram https://t.me/cryptox42Presenting a good product wrongly could affect it negatively. Telegram is not a good place to refer people in this forum to, it looks suspicious. If you want to deal with gamblers on telegram, you could advertise your service on various gambling platforms in telegram. The ideal way to attract members from this forum is to present your proposal in an organized manner. Members need to know the crypto casinos they are testing and what are the terms and conditions and the rewards for participants. You could also hire a campaign manager that coordinate these testing services.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMHello Gambling Enthusiasts!We are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.We will be funding your accounts with real money in crypto.All GEOS welcomedIf interested, contact me on telegram https://t.me/cryptox42There is no need for private telegram conversation just launch your review campaign here for transparency, just like what other campaign managers are doing, if you are an independent project promoter you can do it on your own.I just hope that all the casinos you're promoting are good and reputable, is it just me but I find the name hyipdog not desirable, looks like it's associated with HYIP which is High Yield Investment Program, Let's see if there is a change of direction and he will soon promote HYIP.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Hi OP, can you please discuss the details further here? Telegram is not a good place for this kind of niche.I think it is better if you provide some additional information.What types of crypto casinos will be tested?How much real money will be funded to the account?What kind of feedback are you looking for?What are the expected timeframes for testing and reporting?Is there any compensation offered beyond the funded account?Is there are any specific geographic restrictions or requirements for participants?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I have a feeling OP is setting up a scam. If his offer was genuine, there would be no need to contact him on telegram. My mind goes to the Promo Code scam. Once you contact OP, he direct you to different gambling sites he created and give you a promo code that allegedly gives you some bitcoins to test the site. Those Bitcoins are not real. Now when you try to withdraw, that's when they will ask you to verify/activate the account by sending more Bitcoins. You send the Bitcoins, you get scammed.So OP has probably come here to collect more of his victims.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMWe are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.We will be funding your accounts with real money in crypto.Does the payment will be separate on the balance that you will fund on the casino account or the balance itself is already the payment because no one will accept this service offer if the payment is not guaranteed.It will be helpful too if you can provide the rate and the scope of testing in the casino to have a better understanding on the work.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on December 12, 2023, 12:58:52 PMI have a feeling OP is setting up a scam. If his offer was genuine, there would be no need to contact him on telegram. My mind goes to the Promo Code scam. Once you contact OP, he direct you to different gambling sites he created and give you a promo code that allegedly gives you some bitcoins to test the site. Those Bitcoins are not real. Now when you try to withdraw, that's when they will ask you to verify/activate the account by sending more Bitcoins. You send the Bitcoins, you get scammed.So OP has probably come here to collect more of his victims.I was thinking that until I saw your post, the contact me telegram scheme always raised suspicion, this promo code scam is an old scam scheme, and we should expose him right away I'm 100% sure that this is the plan.He may deny this, but we have seen this happen, it's up to him to prove us wrong by naming the casinos he is working on, I'm sure it is a newly launched casino and creating a review campaign like what bounty managers are doing, failure to do this will just strengthen our suspicion.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 12, 2023, 10:44:19 AMHello Gambling Enthusiasts!We are cooperating with numerous crypto casinos and are looking for crypto gamblers for testing the platforms and provide feedback.We will be funding your accounts with real money in crypto.All GEOS welcomedIf interested, contact me on telegram https://t.me/cryptox42What is your real purpose here, and did you create this topic? Why is it necessary to contact the Telegram channel, as asked by one of our colleagues in this section?Because it is inevitable that you will be thought badly of here if you just do it like that, unless you apply for a Copper membership and you can properly show what you want to promote here on this forum platform. Who knows? Maybe in this matter it can be believed properly.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: A newbie coming here with a very tempting offer and the only way to contact them is through Telegram is a scheme to scam we have seen this a hundred times @logfiles mention there is a hidden agenda behind this because if he has no agenda, he will let it all out here, he will name the casinos and he will create an official review campaign here because that's what the casinos want people reviewing their platform and posting it publicly to inviter people to test the site.OP never mentions anything about the casino, you may contact them in their telegram to inquire but post the casino here and do not deposit when they ask you just to claim your bonus.This is another of those, deposit first to verify your address or claim your bonuses, the community has exposed so many schemes like this.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is obvious that this OP have been here since 2017 Dec. 6th without a single post only to reappear today to make a post. However I think this is just a scheme by OP because I see no reason why the terms of the offer is not properly stated on the OP but rather chose to engage with on telegram which is not appropriate and safe here. We all know that telegram as a platform is very porous and have been the platform for scammers and other nefarious act going on there. Just like others have said, this would have been in a review campaign pattern if OP really wants to be sincere here with the offer because I see no reason why we should contact OP on telegram for such offer when the floor is open for OP to contact a manager or to do a review campaign for openness and transparency.Possibly, there is a hidden agenda to this offer.

comments.author: hyipdog
comments.body: lol you guys are insane and quick to jump to conclusions/biases, I do not care in writing a thread or disclose any further information, contact me on TG if you're a gambler that likes to experiment with casinos or don't, simple as that.Unorthodox method, yes but Im not scamming anyone and Im not telling you to sign up to some shady casino, not even offering a 'promo code' you can verify the casino's rating and EXACT url on Casinoguru before signing up.And my offer is not that tempting by the way, im funding the accounts with very small amounts, I would challenge anyone to point out that I scammed them.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: hyipdog on December 17, 2023, 02:16:03 PMlol you guys are insane and quick to jump to conclusions/biases, I do not care in writing a thread or disclose any further information, contact me on TG if you're a gambler that likes to experiment with casinos or don't, simple as that.Unorthodox method, yes but Im not scamming anyone and Im not telling you to sign up to some shady casino, not even offering a 'promo code' you can verify the casino's rating and EXACT url on Casinoguru before signing up.And my offer is not that tempting by the way, im funding the accounts with very small amounts, I would challenge anyone to point out that I scammed them.Now you're telling us if you complete all the information you're not holding back because there is nothing to hold back if you have no hidden agenda, the scheme of contacting me on telegram for more information coming from newbies has been used so many times by newbies with hidden agendas.We have seen so many of these so don't blame us or laugh at us for something we have seen so many times, the community knows better so follow the community's recommendation if you mean well you'll get all the support you need.
